outputs.output_descr: The institutional, operational and management capacities of the KPU to plan and conduct the 2009 legislative and presidential elections to a high standard
The levels of political and democratic awareness and voter participation in the electoral process, particularly for uderrepresented segments of Indonesian society are expanded.
The capacity and professional capabilities of the KPU (general election office of Indonesia) staff at all levels to enable the KPU to function as a permanent institution of governance are strengthen.
The political and democratic participation in the next cycle of elections, particularly for under-represented segments of, through institutionalization of electoral education initiatives is expanded
The Government of Indonesia is facilitated in arranging a permanent donor coordination facility on support to elections and other efforts to consolidate Indonesia's democracy

project_descr:
Multi Donor Programme -
Support to Indonesia’s Democratic Elections
